form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FORM FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 PLACE DEPARTMENT OF STATE 1516 FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA DATE OF EXAMINATION MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS 6 May 75 At the request of the American Consul at CITY COUNTRY I certify that on the above date I examined NAME AGE SEX Pham Van Thao 55 M WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 5061278 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: A21 198 924 CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Insanity Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed:- (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): You Your admission cannot be authorized at this time are PAROLED until lndy my by Conditions: Refugee VICAM (Port) C 6-4-75 KL (Date) (Immig. Officer) Chest X-ray report heg from Dr. Blood serological report NR from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) gard from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE MD DATE OF FINAL REPORT FORM FS-398 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. 10-74
